p: ODT tablets offer several advantages, combining the properties of solid and liquid formulations. They are quickly ingested when inserted into the tongue, eliminating the need to chew the tablet, swallow it intact or take it with water. Currently, they are a widely accepted form of dosing, especially for patients who have difficulty swallowing (paediatric and geriatric), and for the treatment of patients where therapeutic compliance is difficult [ 51, 52].
